mapper.select: SELECT members.id, members.name,members.age, members.address, members.created, member_types.name AS typeName FROM members JOIN member_types ON members.type_id = member_types.id
SELECT members.id, members.name,members.age, members.address, members.created, members.type_id AS typeId FROM members WHERE members.id = #{id}

SELECT members.id, members.name,members.age, members.address, members.created, member_types.name AS typeName FROM members JOIN member_types ON members.type_id = member_types.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (name, age, address, type_id, created) VALUES (#{name}, #{age}, #{address}, #{typeId}, NOW())
